overview: Schumann at Pier2 is not a usual concert film, it shows the 4 Symphonies of Schumann from a new perspective. Stars of the film are the conductor Paavo Järvi and the Deutsche Kammerphilharmonie Bremen and it´s filmed at „Pier2“, a former dockyard in the harbour of Bremen.  Symphony No. 1, Spring, Op. 38 Symphony No. 2, Op. 61  Symphony No. 3 Rhenish, Op. 97 Symphony No. 4, Op. 120
title: Schumann at Pier2
